meanings.definition: Cooked quickly in a small amount of fat
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious sautes chicken for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The sautes vegetables were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The sautes shrimp danced in the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sautes garlic filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sautes steak sizzled with flavor.

meanings.definition: A dish of food that has been sautéed
meanings.sent1: I ordered the sautes from the menu and it was amazing.
meanings.sent2: The sautes at the restaurant were perfectly seasoned.
meanings.sent3: The sautes on the plate looked like a colorful painting.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sautes filled the room with a tempting smell.
meanings.sent5: The sautes dish was a culinary masterpiece.
